title: Semi-serif font? Jergen's bottle.
content:
[Image](http://web.archive.org/web/20090822030355/http:/www.zuckermanpharmacy.com/images/products/big/473140.jpg)

It’s a very bad image, and a bad angle, but can anyone make something out of the ’Jergens’ text, and the ’Soothing Aloe’? Thanks.
author: Nunymare

comments.content:
Soothing Aloe is Optima

as for the logo or wordmark that’s custom
